verses.name: Mark 9:44
verses.text: Where their worm dieth not, and the fire is not quenched.

verses.name: Mark 9:45
verses.text: And if thy foot offend thee, cut it off: it is better for thee to enter halt into life, than having two feet to be cast into hell, into the fire that never shall be quenched:

verses.name: Mark 9:46
verses.text: Where their worm dieth not, and the fire is not quenched.

verses.name: Mark 9:47
verses.text: And if thine eye offend thee, pluck it out: it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye, than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire:
